dcterms:description: The SST dataset consists of 8544 movie reviews, with a vocabulary of over 16K words, used for sentiment analysis.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST)

dcterms:description: The IMDB movie reviews dataset contains 54K movie reviews, with a vocabulary of over 78K words, used as a background corpus for training.
dcterms:title: IMDB movie reviews

dcterms:creator: William B Dolan
Chris Brockett
dcterms:description: The MRPC dataset is used for paraphrase detection, containing pairs of sentences that are paraphrases of each other.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Research Paraphrase Corpus (MRPC)

dcterms:description: SQuAD is a dataset for machine comprehension of text, containing over 100,000 questions based on a set of Wikipedia articles.
dcterms:title: SQuAD (Stanford Question Answering Dataset)
